website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of colorful plastic straws at an appealing price point.
pros: Set of 25 straws ideal for 20 oz
Free of BPA, BPS, and other toxins
8 colors to choose from, so the whole family can have their own straw
cons: Straws include a small rubber stopper that can't be removed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cutting the plastic straws out of my life and getting into reusable straws and cups and all that. These have super cute colors and worked great. I'm glad I can put them in the dishwasher. I was getting mine from starbucks 3 for 5.00 so these are an amazing price! My only wish was that they were packaged better with something that said BPA free, dishwasher safe, something. I had to get back on the page to re read through it to see. Love the little straw cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Crysta/Karen/Mike

customer_reviews.title: A few dollars’ investment helps the planet and saves money
customer_reviews.text: These are working great. No flaking of the color since it’s mixed into the plastic, and they seem easy to clean. I haven’t had to use the included brush yet. My 3-year-old was chewing on the end of one and squashed it a bit, but I don’t expect them to be indestructible. Great product, great price, and I feel much better not throwing away the disposable ones!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for soda drinkers!
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day to drink diet sodas straight from the can. The side of the straw gets a little scratched up where it comes in contact with the can opening, but nothing major. I wash them in the dishwasher and they come out fine, no warping or melting. I've only used a few from the pack, and the only reason I used more than one is because I lost one of them, they are very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Reusable!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these straws. We had been using the reusable straws that came with our insulated cups for a really long time and they had to be replaced. Our old ones were 10" and these are only 9" but it works fine since I haven't knocked it over once because the straw doesn't stick up so much. They come with a skinny brush so they are easy to keep clean and the colors are fun. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: these are a great alternative. They are large and easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: For those who want to be more environmentally friendly, these are a great alternative. They are large and easy to use with most cups and also easy to clean with the included brush. A pipe cleaner would work as well. I've been using them for a few months now, and they've held up. For the price, you get so many, and can spread them around to use at home, work, and keep a few in the car.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought Ello tumblers on Amazon (and love them), and we wanted to have replacement straws on hand. We bought these straws, and they are so nice! The design is all the way through the plastic-it's not painted/coated on-so it doesn't flake or wear off. The plastic is thick and strong, so the straws are easy to clean and will last a long time. They are slightly skinnier than the straws that came with our Ello tumblers, but it isn't a problem, since the tumblers aren't meant to be perfectly leak proof. These are so nice, we will be using them outside of our tumblers. They'd be super fun for summer parties!
customer_reviews.author: Stevi88

customer_reviews.title: Great straws! Glad I got these instead of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great straws! Glad I got these instead of the SS ones. Has no smell, no taste. The hole is a bit bigger than a regular plastic straw, making drinking smoothies much easier. Aesthetically pleasing to the eye. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: scwheeler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We use straws a lot in our house & I hated going through all the plastic. We recycled them but they are so bad for the environment. I found these & we gave them a try. They work very well & can go in the dishwasher. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to one use plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to be more observant to the single use plastic we use in our home. This is a great alternative. We have washed these in the dishwasher without any damage. Comes with a cleaning brush which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: An easy and fun way to reduce our carbon footprint!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and colorful- we do find we drink water faster with these and that we can re-use them! And an added bonus is they help identify whose large insulated tumbler is whose- definitely worth the $
customer_reviews.author: JSMK in West Chester, OH

customer_reviews.title: Saving on Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately threw all of these in the dishwasher hoping they wouldn't all melt but it was fine. These are working great so far. Glad I don't have to throw away as many straws now. I do wish there was different lengths. I have some shorter cups that I normally would cut down a plastic straw for. I will post in the future if the dishwasher destroys them after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't comfortable with knowing if they truly were BPA free
customer_reviews.text: There was a hair in the bag, which was a generic bag. It appears that they are purchased in bulk and stuffed in bags. I also thought that the straws would be clearly marked with brand info, but they only said "Made in China" and it was a sticker. I wasn't comfortable with knowing if they truly were BPA free, and the hair put me over the edge. They went back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several different kinds for my business and these are perfect quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cpink

customer_reviews.title: I like that I don't have to worry about them running amok should they escape the landfill
customer_reviews.text: I am a dedicated recycler but after hearing stories about refuse intended for recycling getting thrown together w/ non-recyclable refuse, I decided to take responsibility for my own refuse. These are a good length and diameter for regular drinks but not for thicker, smoothie type drinks. I like the small ring on them so they can't slide out of the hole in the lid. And the material is good for not conducting hot or cold to your lips. It comes w/ a small brush if you decide not to put them in the dishwasher as they might get brittle after continuous dishwasher use. Time will tell though.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Trying to be ecologically correct.
customer_reviews.text: We’re trying to help our planet by not using throw away plastic straws that wind up in the oceans. So we bought these and a long straw cleaner brush and use them both at home and when we’re out. The colors are true to the picture, they fit well in a tall glass, are durable (they are hard-not flimsy) and wash well. There is no smell nor taste to them. I’m happy with the product and glad we can make a small difference for the health of our planet.
customer_reviews.author: DiverGal

customer_reviews.title: Fits 16oz cold cup perfectly
customer_reviews.text: A lifetime of straws at a great price that allow me to enjoy my homemade cold brew again. I bent the original straw to my 16oz Starbucks cold cup and ordered these as a replacement. They fit perfectly and I never have to worry about needing a straw again. Nice assortment of colors, excellent quality, no weird smell or aftertaste. My package came with a cleaning brush. So far the colors are holding fine to daily scrubing and cleaning inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The straws are perfect, just what I needed. I lost the straw to my plastic tumbler w/lid I use for my daily smoothie. I was using plastic straws as a replacement for this and for making/servicing mixed drinks. I like that these are reusable in the sense that I don't need to keep purchasing more straws, but also that they are more environmentally friendly. A thin, straw brush works well to clean and I dry them in the tumbler upright so that air can get in and out easily.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Packaging should be more sufficient
customer_reviews.text: Great product- seems well made but packaging didn’t seem adequate. A few arrived with cracks and chips in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these straws for a little over a month now, and I love them. I was afraid at first rather the print on the straws would come off, but I have put them through the dishwasher a few times and nothing has come off. They are sturdy and fit in almost everything. I even got the rest of my family to start using these instead of cheap plastic throw away, so yay for helping the earth!
customer_reviews.author: Shyann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Reduce waste. Save the sea turtles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the intent of saving the sea turtles lol. They are dish washer safe and holding up nicely! I am satisfied and we have less waste! I keep a few in my purse and in the car so we don’t need to use straws when we go out to eat! No paint is chipping off either! My mom came over and took a few because she liked them so much. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Cool Color Plastic Straws
customer_reviews.text: Great set of multi-color straws to use for everyday use or parties. I like the looks, design, and durability of the straws. Not being able to clean them in the dishwasher because of them bending or melting can be timely, but a good scrub in the sink getting i side the straw does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These are harder to break than the straws that came with my drinkable mason jars!
customer_reviews.text: We have a bunch of mason jars with straw lids from last summer. The original straws broke fairly easily because they were very brittle. When they’d break the edges were sharp. These were the perfect remedy! They are much less brittle, harder to break, and fit perfectly. And the price was great! Would order again if these go missing. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Ben Willocks

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning for breakfast and I used to go to the gas station and take extra straws but I got tired of that so I bought some silicon straws and HATED them so I bought these straws and they work perfect!! I throw them in the dishwasher and have a new straw every day, I love them!! They are bigger than a normal straw but not huge so they work perfect for my smoothies!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sharp

customer_reviews.title: I use these every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws - they are the perfect size (just like disposable plastic straws), very durable, and well made. I haven't found any rough edges on any of them, and they clean up nicely. I put them through the dishwasher and it doesn't harm them at all. I have larger silicon straws that I prefer for smoothies, but for everything else, these are my go-to straws. And with 25 in the set, there are enough to use between wash cycles, even with kids in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Israel

customer_reviews.title: Love the brush that came with these to really get ...
customer_reviews.text: Doing our part, one straw at a time. Love the brush that came with these to really get the insides clean. My toothy soon has only chewed one up so far, which is really saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Thecla

customer_reviews.title: Find these better than the steel ones.
customer_reviews.text: I find these straws easy to clean and use. I tried the metal ones, and it was hard on my teeth. These are not. They are quite long lasting as well. I have not had a problem with them getting gunked up with stuff. I use a little straw cleaning brush on them to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Kucharski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just received these. They are sturdy without appearing to be brittle. I like the ring on one end to prevent the straw from falling out of my drink. So far the only thing I would change would be to have them be colorless. The cleaning brush appears to be very adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Barb

customer_reviews.title: I like the reusable but not bite proof for the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the reusable but not bite proof for the kids so they won't last as long as I'd hope
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Orth

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Pretty and Environmentally Responsible!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, color and size of these straws! Love the little brush thats included to clean them if you don’t want to put them in your dishwasher. I put them in the dishwasher and they come out very clean. They also have the lip on one end if you want use them with a plastic cup requiring a straw.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great straws.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using straws with almost everything, but didn’t like the metal ones so I got these. They at great. The brush that came with it is not long enough to go all the way through, so that’s a bummer, but you can see through them to see if they are clean.
customer_reviews.author: StrandedpatricK

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws...great for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these straws. I gave 5 stars for flavor, because there is no taste caused from the straws. They are easy to clean and they look nice sitting on my counter in a tall glass container.
customer_reviews.author: V B.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT THE HECK
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and as described. Except it was covered in a...residue. It smelled bad and was greasy. I have no idea what to say.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carney

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I use them, rinse them, and throw them in the bottom rack of the dishwasher with the silverware. Have had no problems, except when someone doesn't rinse them out after using them and stuff gets stuck. But they provide you with a little pipe cleaner, or they are so inexpensive you could just toss them if you're lazy like I tend to be sometimes. Overall, I use them all the time and happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great to help the environment a little
customer_reviews.text: They look just like the pictures. It does include the little brush! But they came in a simple plastic bag with a Made in China sticker so I wouldn’t be sure about the BPA free claim. However, I feel like I’m helping the environment in a way so I’m happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: We got our first set of straws last year. They have been great. The kids do bite them and over time they will smush but still work great. Buying again because we have lost most of them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Colorful sturdy straws
customer_reviews.text: These are great straws. Can’t beat the price. Since so many places have stopped using straws I can bring my own. Most cruises don’t have straws anymore so these will be packed in my luggage on my cruise in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Dee F

customer_reviews.title: we used so many disposable plastic straws in my house. not anymore. love these.
customer_reviews.text: we love these straws. used to use so many disposable straws before i found these. my husband uses them for his protein shakes and even though the shake is of thick consistency the has no problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: A R S

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! My kids are going through a big star phase, and these are perfect. They go through the dishwasher in the silverware slot too! Added bonus is they don’t fall out of the kids cups
customer_reviews.author: Andra

customer_reviews.title: Use all the time now.
customer_reviews.text: Without the skinny long brush these are difficult to clean, but I keep them in the silverware drawer and are the only straws we use in the house now. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: bosephus

customer_reviews.title: Love these straws!
customer_reviews.text: These are great straws! Great lightening deal price, comes with the stick brush to thoroughly clean the inside. Such pretty colors they go with my Yeti tumblers as well as my daughters sippy cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These straws are perfect to replace the ones that came with the cups I bought. They're very well made and come in fun colors. The brush that came with them is great for cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Use reusables
customer_reviews.text: These were taller than I was expecting but I like their nice colors and the fact that are reusables.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Almache

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere does it say BPA free
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as BPA free, which is why I purchased them. Nowhere on the package does it say this. I ended up donating them because there is no sound proof that these do not contain BPA.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am horrible at keeping straws. They either break or melt or disappear. These so far have been great. They look great and so far I haven't destroyed any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I switched to these reusable straws. These are all the straws my family will need for decades. The included cleaning brush was also a great feature. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Schliemannski

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver. Love using them no more threat to wild life caused by my family and me. Also the use and throw stares my child used to chre it out. I'm glad to purchase them . They also came with a cleaning straw. Fits well in the jamba cups too😉
customer_reviews.author: Ashika Devi-Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect straws, kinder to the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w/ these straws. Kinder to the environment and keeps my lipstick off glasses! The individual color swirl isn’t painted on like other straws which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Joji

customer_reviews.title: Good for the planet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! They make me feel like I’m doing something right for the environment. I take one in my breakfast smoothie to work- different color each day.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, we don`t keep throwing straws in the trash and they are the perfect size for all our drink cups. They are a total win / win. One thing is when the kids come over they keep disappearing, guess we need to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: KIRT

customer_reviews.title: Easy use and easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Love reusable straws . Our house hold love making cold drinks and smoothie, so the amount of straws it came with and the cleaning tool worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good colors, sturdy, reusable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, I like the colors and the cleaning brush they comes with it. These are not disposable, you can use them over and over, just clean them with the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as replacements for my tumblers when I either lost the straw or they melted in the dishwasher. These straws are very sturdy and dishwasher safe. I love the little brush that allows me to clean the inside when something gets stuck inside (like when using for smoothies). My kids love them as well and get excited to choose a new color every day.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great straws
customer_reviews.text: These straws are holding up well and helping our family save the earth. They have been washed in the dishwasher and always come out nice and clean. Very cute and fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came with 25 straws and the cleaning brush. I kind of assumed for the price that they wouldn't be very good, but I was pleasantly surprised. Very good quality, the colors are vibrant and fun. The straw fits into a variety of cups that I have, including a lidded jar glass, my 20 oz water cup, and my yeti tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Helmick

customer_reviews.title: Price and durability is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most amazing purchases I’ve ever made. It’s in dishwasher without going through holes is easy to use and it’s long enough for any huge glasses that you might use. Highly highly highly highly highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: No more disposables!
customer_reviews.text: No more disposable straws in our house. These are sturdy and come with a small brush to clean them. Fits in lots of cups that came with straws when you first bought them, but those straws are all chewed up now. These make a great replacement. The colors are fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Zelda302 (josh)

customer_reviews.title: Enviro- friendly straws.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Shared package with others and get asked where I got them. Like that multi colors in pack so I can match all our cups and yetis.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Singelton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality straws for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The clear area help tell if the straws are clean. The color helps differentiate who identical cups belong to. Easy to clean. Quantity to last quite some time. Great price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: What can I say about straws?
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love them. Each picked their favorite color. A good way to get them to drink water. The straws make it "taste better".
customer_reviews.author: MeeMa in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package does not state BPA FREE? made in China, that's all that's on the package
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Nice to know it can be reused.
customer_reviews.text: We got these as end of year gifts for middle school science students to show them alternatives to disposable plastic straws. A great way to show there are other materials you can use that aren’t disposable.
customer_reviews.author: schroederho

customer_reviews.title: Go green!
customer_reviews.text: These straws have held up very well through the dishwasher over many months. They work great for smoothies. It came with so many that I was able to give some out to friends who also appreciate them.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: These were part of a gift bag for an environmentally conscious friend, she was tickled to have them. Nice colors and they look like they will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lori G. Cain

customer_reviews.title: I use them to drink my smoothies in the morning and they are perfect. I love that the straws come with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I use them to drink my smoothies in the morning and they are perfect. I love that the straws come with a brush, helps keep the straws clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews, but these are fantastic! They’re cute, eco-friendly, and very easy to clean. I love that the little cleaning brush is included, but I haven’t even had to use it yet . . . I just throw them in the dishwasher and it gets them spotless inside and out! The pattern isn’t fading or falling off at all and I’ve been using them heavily for about two months now. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PolishFan

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I’ve probably bought them 2 or 3 times now. I use them everyday! I got these to switch from regular single-use straws and they’re cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley P

customer_reviews.title: They're plastic straws, not much to it.
customer_reviews.text: They seem nice and sturdy, they look nice, and the included brush makes them easy to clean. Just wish I didn't have to buy so many, but at $7 can't really complain, I just gave a few to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Easily dishwashable
customer_reviews.text: I dishwash these straws, and didn't have to use the included brush once. Very convenient, and there are lots of them included, so when I have guests over, I always have plenty available.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Cat

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to send with my tumblers. The colors are fun and price was perfect. .
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great straws.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these straws to replace disposable straws. They are very nice. I like all the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are straws. So... They work as intended. Came with a little cleaner thing to help scrub the inside of them.
customer_reviews.author: H0RSE

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: These are good but will buy more environmentally friendly, non-plastic straws in the future.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Saving the planet one straw at a time
customer_reviews.text: Great straws, and they replace all those plastics that we don’t need to fill the planet with.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: My son needs a straw to drink and I hated to continue to throw out straw after straw These are durable and easy to clean and he likes them
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kutz

customer_reviews.title: No More Disposable Straws
customer_reviews.text: We use these on a daily basis - no more disposable straws for us. I do occasionally soak them in a diluted bleach mixture to make sure the germs are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great straws
customer_reviews.text: Love these - better for environment and great for all sorts of miscellaneous kid and adult drinks... I flip inside kids cups so they can’t pull straws out
customer_reviews.author: Angela Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these straws
customer_reviews.text: These straws are great. I wanted to go more green to use reusable straws. This was the perfect choice. Nice colors, good quality. I wash them in the dishwasher and sometimes use the extra cleaning tool which was part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ocean friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and washability. A great aid in decreasing the plastic pollution in our oceans and landfills. Stop using disposable straws.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Let’s help out Mother Earth and use these vs plastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they state they are and the functionality is exactly what we’d expect. I would love to see the demise of all plastic straws one day and use alternatives. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: LPN78

customer_reviews.title: They're straws, y'all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this many so I can keep them everywhere - some in the car, at work, at home, in my bag. I've also given them to friends who seem interested. I'm like a reusable straw evangelist over here. They work like straws and they clean like straws. Get some.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harris

customer_reviews.title: Save the planet, one step at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Very good plastic reusable straws! Easy to clean and much better to use on the go or at home!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: They are very colorful, sturdy , tall and the cleaning brush is a plus. i wish they came with a small carrying case. In CA you don't automatically get straws in places anymore and I would like to be able to carry my own.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Barr

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe. Sturdy. Perfect for 30 oz tumblers. Don't have the weird feeling of metal straws.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to match covers for mugs that I made for my grand daughter's birthday party. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Quality straws and plenty of them for a good price, and they’re dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper88

customer_reviews.title: good to have
customer_reviews.text: liked them very much, very happy with the purchase, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: frisky-frisco-1

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. Great price. Wash up easily in the dishwasher. Ordered a second time because I'm so happy with them. Easy to keep a handful in my car, desk at work, purse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily usage
customer_reviews.text: We used to go through a ton of plastic straws but NO MORE! Love them so much we bought another pack to have on-hand for birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these straw and they've worked great. Just as expected with fun colors to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came with a cleaning tool ! Great colors and quality, noting to complain about here
customer_reviews.author: Moespinkworld

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My kids love them. Would have given them five stars but they are starting to bend at the opening because my kids are biting them. You must clean them with the brush provided or the insides will have buildup on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable straws are a must!
customer_reviews.text: These straws are great! So far, they've fit all my cups with plastic straws. I like having a reusable straw (save the environment!), and these were just what I needed to replace a few broken straws. I also appreciate that it came with a cleaning brush!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Fun and different
customer_reviews.text: Like the fun colors and all the fun comments I have received from friends
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: These straws absolutely amazing for drinking all kinds of beverages, hot or cold. Plus.They work easily with large cups, regular or tall glasses. Great for anyone with senstive dental work needing to keep certain liquids away from the teeth or even staining of the teeth. In my house they're used constantly now. We like the look and finish of them too. Cleaning is quick and easy and while the included cleaning brush is another nice perk.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: They work great! I like the little barrier to prevent them from escaping. They're in great condition after going through the dishwasher numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: spacklewoof

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with cleaning brush but enjoying them despite that.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with cleaning brush but enjoying them despite that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe and durable
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for some weeks, but seem durable so far even after multiple cycles through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: easy cleaning and after Jan 1 we will be taking them out for dinner
customer_reviews.author: G. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these straws, easy to throw in the dishwasher. Great for yeti type cups.
customer_reviews.author: My  Experience

customer_reviews.title: perfect reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: my family was probably buying a box of straws each month... i decided to try these and love them! I soak them in hot, soapy water and then use the brush that came with the straws to clean out the inside. Easy to clean. No complaints from our family.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Craig

product_meta.title: 25 Pieces Reusable Plastic Straws. BPA-Free, 9 Inch Long Drinking Transparent Straws Fit for Mason Jar, Yeti Tumbler, Cleaning Brush Included.
feature_bullets: 【REUSABLE ECO-FRIENDLY STRAWS】: The collapsible stainless steel straws are reusable, which can replace the plastic or paper straw used daily. Reduce stress and pollution on the environment, Save the earth from disposable plastic.

【EASY TO CLEAN】 Collapsible straw come with cleaning brush that fiwhich is long enough to clean the whole straw, and makes it easy to clean the straw in seconds.Party Straws are dishwasher safe you can also easily wash this collapsible straw with water.

【COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN & PORTABLE SOLUTION】: The portable set includes stainless steel folding straw, cleaning brush, sturdy case and an attachable keychain. Our straws comes in a sturdy case specifically designed to keep it clean and handy. There is an attachable keychain option, You can tie the case to your belt or bag, you can carry it with you wherever you go.

【SAFETY BPA FREE】: Our foldable straw is made from absolutely the best material, premium food-grade stainless steel and medical-grade TPE interior tube material, 100% BPA Free, FDA Approved. Our straw is perfect for you to enjoy any cold or hot drink.

【PERFECT LENGTH】 The whole folding straws is 9 inchs, it can perfectly sized to fit in a glass or in many other short cocktail glasses, Enjoy drinking your smoothie, boba tea, water, or whatever tickles your fancy with this straw.
